casebody.data:
SECOND NATIONAL BANK OF TOLEDO, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. M. SAMUEL & SONS, Inc., Defendant-Appellant. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. November 15, 1929. No. 77. Morris D. Kopple, of New York City (Herbert D. Cohen, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Morris, Plante & Saxe, of New York City (Stuart H. Benton, of New York City, of counsel), for appellee..

Before L. HAND, SWAN, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed in open court.
